name: src/addresses.js
Addresses
description: Addresses contains addresses of all contracts of a KyberNetwork reserve.

name: constructor
description: Create a addresses instance.

params.name: reserve
params.description: Address of reserve smart contract.

params.name: conversionRates
params.description: Address of pricing smart contract.

params.name: sanityRates
params.description: Address of pricing smart contract.

name: src/base_contract.js
BaseContract
description:
BaseContract contains common methods for all contracts of a KyberNetwork
reserve.

name: constructor
description: Create new BaseContract instance.

params.name: web3
params.description: Web3 instance

params.name: address
params.description: address of smart contract.

name: admin
description: Return the current admin address of contract.

return.description: current admin address

name: pendingAdmin
description:
Return the pending admin address of contract.
An admin address is placed in pending if it is transfered but hasn't been
claimed yet.

return.description: pending admin address

name: transferAdmin
description: transfer admin privilege to given address.

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: current admin account

params.name: address
params.description: new admin address

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: claimAdmin
description:
Claim admin privilege. The account address should be in already placed
in pendingAdmin for this to works.

params.name: newAccount
params.description: the pending admin account

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: getOperators
description: Return operator addresses of contract.

return.description: list of operator addresses

name: addOperator
description: Add given address from operators list.

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: current admin account

params.name: address
params.description: address to remove from operators list.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: removeOperator
description: Remove given address from operators list.

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: current admin account

params.name: address
params.description: address to remove from operators list.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: getAlerters
description: Return alerter addresses of contract.

return.description: list of alerter addresses

name: addAlerter
description: Add new address to alerters list.

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: current admin account

params.name: address
params.description: address to add to alerters list.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (string) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: removeAlerter
description: Remove address from alerters list.

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: current admin account

params.name: address
params.description: address to remove from alerters list.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (string) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: src/conversion_rates_contract.js
CompactData
description:
CompactData is used to save gas on get, set rates operations.
Instead of sending the whole buy, sell rates every time, only the different
is sent if possible.
The compact rate is calculated by following formula:

     compact = ((rate / base) - 1) * 1000

name: constructor
description: Create a new CompactData instance.

params.name: rate
params.description: the total rate

params.name: base
params.description: the base to generate compact data

name: buildCompactBulk
description:
Build the compact data input.
In ConversionRates contract, the compact data is stored in two dimensions
array with location:
  - bulkIndex
  - indexInBulk

When setting compact data, user needs to submit the whole bulk along with
its index.

params.name: newBuys
params.description: buy compact data

params.name: newSells
params.description: sell compact data

params.name: indices
params.description: map of address to its bulk index

name: TokenControlInfo
description: TokenControlInfo is the configurations of a ERC20 token.

name: constructor
description: Create a new TokenControlInfo instance.

params.name: minimalRecordResolution
params.description: {uint} - minimum denominator in token wei that can be changed

params.name: maxPerBlockImbalance
params.description:
{uint} - maximum wei amount of net absolute (+/-) change for a token in an ethereum
block

params.name: maxTotalImbalance
params.description:
{uint} - wei amount of the maximum net token change allowable that happens between 2
price updates

name: constructor
description: Create a new StepFunctionDataPoint.

params.name: x
params.description: {int} - buy step in wei amount

params.name: y
params.description: {int} - impact on buy rate in basis points (bps). 1 bps = 0.01%

name: RateSetting
description: RateSetting represents the buy sell rates of a ERC20 token.

name: constructor
description: Create a new RateSetting instance.

params.name: address
params.description: ERC20 token address

params.name: buy
params.description: buy rate per ETH

params.name: sell
params.description: sell rate per ETH

name: CompactDataLocation
description:
CompactDataLocation is the location of compact data of a token in
ConversionRates contract. When adding a new token, ConversionRatesContract
allocated a fixed location in compact data array for it, this can't be
changed.

name: ConversionRatesContract
description:
ConversionRatesContract represents the KyberNetwork conversion rates smart
contract.

name: constructor
description: Create new ConversionRatesContract instance.

params.name: provider
params.description: Web3 provider

params.name: address
params.description: address of smart contract.

name: getTokenIndices
description:
getTokenIndices returns the index of given Token to use in setCompact
data call.

params.name: token
params.description: ERC 20 token address

return.description: index ot compact data

name: addToken
description:
Add a ERC20 token and its pricing configurations to reserve contract and
enable it for trading.

params.name: adminAccount
params.description: admin account address

params.name: token
params.description: ERC20 token address

params.name: tokenControlInfo
params.description: https://developer.kyber.network/docs/VolumeImbalanceRecorder#settokencontrolinfo

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: updateTokenControlInfo
description:
Add a ERC20 token and its pricing configurations to reserve contract and
enable it for trading.

params.name: adminAccount
params.description: admin account address

params.name: token
params.description: ERC20 token address

params.name: tokenControlInfo
params.description: https://developer.kyber.network/docs/VolumeImbalanceRecorder#settokencontrolinfo

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: setImbalanceStepFunction
description:
Set adjustments for tokens' buy and sell rates depending on the net traded
amounts. Only operator can invoke.

params.name: operatorAddress
params.description: address of the operator account

params.name: token
params.description: ERC20 token address

params.name: buy
params.description: array of buy step function configurations

params.name: sell
params.description: array of sell step function configurations

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: setQtyStepFunction
description:
Set adjustments for tokens' buy and sell rates depending on the size of a
buy / sell order. Only operator can invoke.

params.name: operatorAddress
params.description: address of the operator account

params.name: token
params.description: ERC20 token address

params.name: buy
params.description: array of buy step function configurations

params.name: sell
params.description: array of sell step function configurations

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: getBuyRates
description:
Return the buying ETH based rate. The rate might be vary with
different quantity.

params.name: token
params.description: token address

params.name: qty
params.description: quantity of token

params.name: currentBlockNumber
params.description:
current block number, default to
use latest known block number.

return.description: buy rate

name: getSellRates
description:
Return the buying ETH based rate. The rate might be vary with
different quantity.

params.name: token
params.description: token address

params.name: qty
params.description: quantity of token

params.name: currentBlockNumber
params.description:
current block number
known block number.

name: setRate
description: Set the buying rate for given token.

params.name: operatorAddress
params.description: address of the operator account

params.name: rates
params.description: token address

params.name: currentBlockNumber
params.description: current block number

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

name: src/deployer.js
KyberNetworkAddress
description:
KyberNetworkAddress is the smart contract address of KyberNetwork.</br>
*Last updated*: 2018, August 31

name: Deployer
description:
Deployer is used for deploying new KyberNetwork reserve contracts. It deployed all requires smart contracts for running a reserve:
  • reserve
  • conversionRates
  • sanityRates (optional)

name: constructor
description: Create a deployer instance with given account parameter.

params.name: web3
params.description: Web3 instance

name: deploy
description: Deploy new reserve and pricing contracts.

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: Web3 account to create the smart contracts. This account is also set to be admin of the contracts

params.name: network
params.description: Address of KyberNetwork smart contract.

params.name: sanityRates
params.description: If true, sanityRates contract will be deployed.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

return.description: Deployed reserve addresses set.

name: src/index.js
content:
import 'babel-polyfill'

export { default as Deployer } from './deployer.js'
export { default as BaseContract } from './base_contract.js'
export { default as ConversionRatesContract , CompactData as CompactData,
        TokenControlInfo as TokenControlInfo , StepFunctionDataPoint as StepFunctionDataPoint ,
        RateSetting as RateSetting, CompactDataLocation as CompactDataLocation
        } from './conversion_rates_contract.js'
//export * from './conversion_rates_contract.js'
export { default as ReserveContract } from './reserve_contract.js'
export { default as SanityRatesContract } from './sanity_rates_contract.js'

export { default as Reserve } from './reserve.js'

name: src/permission_assert.js
src/reserve.js
Reserve
description:
Reserve is the wrapper to call all methods related to
managing a reserve. It required a provider and the addresses of
reserve contract, conversionRates contract and optionally, SanityRates contract

params.name: web3
params.description: Web3 instance

params.name: addresses
params.description: addresses of the contracts

name: enableTrade
description: enableTrade allow the reserve to continue trading

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: address of Admin account

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

return.description: the tx object of send() command from this contract method

name: disableTrade
description: disableTrade stop the reserve from trading

params.name: alerterAddress
params.description: address of Alerter account

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: (optional) - the gasPrice desired for the tx

return.description: the tx object of send() command from this contract method

name: tradeEnabled
description: tradeEnabled return true if the reserve is tradeEnabled, false otherwise

return.description: tradeEnabled status of the reserve

name: setContracts
description: set Contract addresses for reserve contract.

unknown.tagValue: {object} - the tx object of send() command from this contract method

params.description: address of admin account.

params.name: network
params.description: address of kyber network smart contract.

params.description: address of kyber network smart contract.

params.name: sanity
params.description: (optional) - address of sanity rates contract.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: the gasPrice desired for the tx

return.description: the tx object of send() command from this contract method

return.description: address of conversion rates contract

return.description: address of sanity rates contract

description: kyberNetwork return the address of kyberNetwork contract of this reserve

return.description: address of kyberNetwork contract

params.name: address
params.description: address to withdraw the token to

return.description: true for approved, false otherwise

name: withdraw
description: withdraw an amount of token to specified account

unknown.tagValue: {object} - the tx object of send() command from this contract method

params.name: adminAddress
params.description: address of admin account.

params.name: tokenAddress
params.description: address of the token's smart contract. Must be deployed already.

params.name: amount
params.description: amount to withdraw (BN|String|int), must be in wei.

params.name: toAddress
params.description: address for withdrawal. Must be approved already.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: the gasPrice desired for the tx

return.description: the tx object of send() command from this contract method

description: Return balance of given token.

params.name: token

params.description: list of Rates in ETH weit

params.name: dest

name: setReasonableDiff
description: setResonableDiff Set reasonable conversion rate difference in percentage (any conversion rate outside of this range is considered unreasonable).

name: src/sanity_rates_contract.js
SanityRatesContract
description:
SanityRatesContract represents the KyberNetwork sanity rates smart contract.
It's purpose is to prevent unusual rates from conversion rates contract
to be used.

params.name: provider
params.description: Web3 provider

params.name: address
params.description: address of smart contract.

name: getSanityRate

unknown.tagValue: {string} - the uint rate in strings format.

params.name: src
params.description: ERC20 token contract address of source token

params.name: dest
params.description: ERC20 token contract address of destination token

return.description: the uint rate in strings format.

name: setSanityRates
description: Set Sanity Rate for the contract

unknown.tagValue: {object} - the tx object of send() command from this contract method

return.description: the tx object of send() command from this contract method
